Is it possible to change my UOB Lady ‚Äòs category if I just signed up but have not receive the card?
no  any change will only take effect next quarter
Yes  selection for the very first quarter will take effect immediatelyhttps://www.uob.com.sg/assets/pdfs/ladys-cards-tcs.pdfSubsequently  selections will take effect in the quarter after selection
Able to check. If I am using UOB Lady then I plan to upgrade to uob lady solitaire. The UNI$ will continue over to new card or need to convert out first?
UNI$ are pooled across all UOB cards that earn UNI$ so no worrieswhat you need to watch and be concerned about is when your new categories take effect.. better read the TNC properly

Can i ask u applied online?If so how long did u wait to get the card?

Yes I applied online sometime last year! I applied for UOB One and UOB Krisflyer debit cards. I got the cards in a week. (But one of them didn't come with the pin code  so I went directly to the nearest UOB Branch to sort it out)

I went to the branch at CCK. Staff are quite efficient.Would recommend writing down a list of questions for them to answer if you are unsure of some stuff. They are really helpful. Downside is the waiting time. Waited about 1.5 hours for my turn.
